subject: Re: Tone mod-1
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Thanks, I heard that too, but mostly this was to demonstrate the tone 
adjustment. I now have that in the last two boards I've made. Now I'm 
starting one to solve the noise problems with the RVG. The noise pick 
up from the white noise amps is much more severe than I ever suspected. 

 Frank-S
